Mark,

=
Thanks for the info on Kendo World and the Naginata book. I'll look
into it=
. I am a "practitioner"-, although the weapon I mostly train
with is the ka=
tana. Nonetheless, I started training with naginata,
too, about, oh, 3 year=
s ago. I'm still a rank beginner, but I'm very
much interested in it as a w=
eapon. I also started training in Yari
around the same time. But while I pr=
actice and learn katana waza
weekly, or sometimes more often, I do naginata=
 and yari maybe once a month.

Best Regards,

Andres

At 07:54 AM 12/8/2006=
, you wrote:

sh that
I

ing to
study

e Definitive Guide by

A warning

on" for being slow with their orders.

ere hasn't been any movement on my

ion of my request. Expect a wait of

omes with some glowing reviews since
